title: Can i not use Chroma packs with the new champ select?
body: i didnt have much time to actually check if i could since i was last pick but i didnt see an option for me to use my chroma packs so i was just wondering if this was only me or if it just hasnt been implemented or if i just missed it

replies.body: At this moment you cannot do that. They added that option to the champion select for next patch, so wait till Wednesday
